revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RP-AC53 |revision=A1 |series=AC750 |serialnum_prefix=90IG03Y0-BO3410 |asin=B01N0Y5SYJ;GB;, |newegg= |price=45 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |fcc_date=05/29/2015 |fcc_id=MSQ-RPAC53 |ic_id=3568A-RPAC53 |pcb_id= |type=repeater, range extender, |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8881AN |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8881AN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_RPAC53, ASUS_RPAC53_5G |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=70:4D:7B, 88:D7:F6 |oui_eth=70:4D:7B, 88:D7:F6 }}
:• '''433''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''AC750'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless-AC750 Dual Band Repeater}} :{{SupportPage/sandbox|vendor=ASUS|model=RP-AC53}} *Web GUI: http://repeater.asus.com ===Overview=== *'''Boost Existing Wi-Fi''' - Extend 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi network :with speeds up to 733 Mbps. *'''Easy Setup''' - Find the best location with the smart LED signal :strength indicator, and set up with the WPS button. *'''ASUS Extender app''' - PC-free setup of network, anytime, anywhere. *'''Flexible Mode Options''' – Repeater, Access Point or Media Bridge. *'''AC Pass-Through''' - Keeps the power outlet free for use. ===Reviews=== *[https://www.redeszone.net/asus/rp-ac53-ac750/ ''ASUS RP-AC53'' on '''RedesZone'''] (ES) *[https://techtest.org/wie-viel-repeater-braucht-man-wirklich-7x-wlan-repeater-im-vergleich/ ''ASUS RP-AC51/55'' on '''TechTest'''] (DE) *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/asus-rp-ac53-ac750-dual-band-wi-fi-repeater-3839 ''ASUS RP-AC53'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> |
# Realtek SoC
#export RT-RTL8198C := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  #IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y LFP=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y USB="USB" BUILD_NAME="RT-RTL8198C" #DNSMQ=y MODEM=y 
  NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y DEBUGFS=y JFFS2LOG=y REPEATER=y DUALWAN=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y CFE_NVRAM_CHK=y #DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y JFFS2=y

export RP-AC68U := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y MEDIASRV=y
  SMARTSYNCBASE=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" APP="installed" BUILD_NAME="RP-AC68U" 
  RPAC68U=y NVRAM_64K=y TFAT=y NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" ODMPID=y YAFFS=y 
  PSISTLOG=y REPEATER=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y 
  CONCURRENTREPEATER=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y WEBDAV=y 
  REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC55 := REALTEK=y RTL8197F=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC55" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y WLCSCAN_RSSI=y BT_CONN=y MUMIMO_5G=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC53 := REALTEK=y RTL819X=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC53" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y
}} ===See also=== *[[ASUS RP-AC87]] - ''Wireless-AC2600 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC87/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC68U]] - ''Wireless-AC1900 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC68U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC66]] - ''Wireless-AC1750 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC66 PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC56]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC56/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC55]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC55/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC53]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC53/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC52]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater/AP'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC51]] - ''AC750 Wall-Plug Wi-Fi Range Extender'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC51/ PPage] :''/Access Point/Media Bridge with Signal Indicator'' • [https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07577ZQTB B07577ZQTB] __NOTOC__
